I need to add some details to the JUnit Report for some processing done 
afterwords.  Things like the owner of the test.  Is there any way this 
can be specified somewhere in the JUnit Test so that it ends up in the 
Report?  I was thinking annotations or javadoc tags but I don't see a 
way to get those in the Report.
